EmailTemplate.name: 2019.12.04 - BS - Coffee Subscription.BS - Coffee Subscription
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Daily Coffee Without Braving The Cold
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Winter’s Here And So Is Your Coffee! Avoid the freezing temperatures outside with a coffee subscription and ensure your favourite drink’s delivered and in stock whenever you want it. It’s the easy way to keep the office feeling valued, more productive, and warm!
